sentences.sContent: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.sContent_eng: I always used to laugh to myself when I heard people say that we need to take care of ourselves in order to be able to take care of others.
sentences.sCn: 我听到一些人说要照顾好我们自己，这样我们才有能力去照顾好别人。 不知道为什么，当我听到这句话的时候，我经常笑我自己。

sentences.sContent: Because the office refrigerator is unowned by any individual, no one feels responsibility to take care of it, and certainly no one wants to take time out of his or her busy workday to do so.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because the office refrigerator is unowned by any individual, no one feels responsibility to take care of it, and certainly no one wants to take time out of his or her busy workday to do so.
sentences.sCn: 办公室里的冰箱因为不属于任何一个个人，没有人觉得自己有责任去管理或者照顾它，当然也没人在繁忙的工作时间抽出时间去做那些事情。
